nodes.title: Sources
nodes.body:
A: Bka’ gdams chos ’byung gsal ba’i sgron me by Las chen kun dga’ rgyal mtshan (1432-1506).

B: Deb ther sngon po by ’Gos lo tsā ba gzhon nu dpal (1392-1481).

C: Dpal ldan lo dgon bshad sgrubs bstan ’phel gling gi dkar chags mos ldan dad pa’i ’jug ngogs by Blo gros bsam gtan.
